name: Sicilian4ever
subtitle: A source for all my apps
description: Welcome to my Altstore Repo source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Daily Vibes
apps.subtitle: Track daily your vibes and make notes about it
apps.localizedDescription: This app was made with the intention to track the daily vibe by simply using emojis and with possibility in making notes if wanted. It is possible to monitor the daily vibes both monthly (by default), yearly, considering all the avaiable data and even selecting a custom time window. The app allow to export all the logged data so that can be easily imported in another iOS device or just stored.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows the app to refresh content in the background
